translated: The Paṭṭhāna🔽The three-factored dependent origination in forward and reverse order

analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The three-factored dependent origination in forward order

original: 13.14. Hīnattika🔽Hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikatikasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: hīnattika  hīnam dhammam paṭicca na hīnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: Inferior🔽With an inferior state as condition, a superior state arises: by root-cause condition … (as in the section on the mixed triad, §1) …

original: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekādasa …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnavīsa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke ekādasa pe avigate ekūnavīsa
translated: In the section on root-cause, there are nineteen; in the section on object, nine; … in the section on kamma result, eleven; … in the section on non-hindrance, nineteen.
